item.description:
Tantric invites us to come on in to light our fire during their "Happy 'H'ours" by experiencing a libation awakening with tasty and spicy treats at their hip and hot spot in the theatre district.

I will arrive at 5 and stay until about 7. Feel free to show up when you're able and hang as long as you can, but if you want to save some dough, get there between 3:30 and 6:00 for the specials.

A free drink to the first new member who finds me. Don't be shy...Say hi.

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Boylston (green line) subway station is closest, less than (five (5) minute walk). N.E. Medical (orange line) subway station is less than a ten (10) minute walk.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the friendly group at the bar
item.name: Tantric Happy 'H'ours Wednesday December 16th at 5 PM
